mapper.update: update product set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ptitle = #{ptitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainImage = #{mainimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subImage = #{subimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pstock = #{pstock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pstatus = #{pstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, pdetail = #{pdetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pid, pname, price, tid, ptitle, mainImage, subImage, pstock, pstatus, createTime, updateTime, pdetail from product where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pid, pname, price, tid, ptitle, mainImage, subImage, pstock, pstatus, createTime, updateTime, pdetail from product
